    General

    variables

    select-background

    $select-background: $white !default;

    Description

    Background color for select menus.

    Type

    Color

    select-triangle-color

    $select-triangle-color: $dark-gray !default;

    Description

    Color of the dropdown triangle inside select menus. Set to transparent to remove it entirely.

    Type

    Color

    select-radius

    $select-radius: $global-radius !default;

    Description

    Default radius for select menus.

    Type

    Color

    mixins

    button-expand

    @mixin button-expand($expand: true) { ... }

    Description

    Expands a button to make it full-width.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $expand

    Set to true to enable the expand behavior. Set to false to reverse this behavior.

    		Booleantrue

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-style

    @mixin button-style($background: $button-background, $background-hover: $button-background-hover, $color: $button-color) { ... }

    Description

    Sets the visual style of a button.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $background

    Background color of the button.

    		Color$button-background
    $background-hover

    Background color of the button on hover. Set to auto to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

    		Color$button-background-hover
    $color

    Text color of the button. Set to auto to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

    		Color$button-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-hollow

    @mixin button-hollow() { ... }

    Description

    Removes background fill on hover and focus for hollow buttons.

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-disabled

    @mixin button-disabled() { ... }

    Description

    Adds disabled styles to a button by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

    Parameters

    None.

    button-dropdown

    @mixin button-dropdown($size: 0.4em, $color: white, $offset: $button-padding) { ... }

    Description

    Adds a dropdown arrow to a button.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $size

    Size of the arrow. We recommend using an em value so the triangle scales when used inside different sizes of buttons.

    		Number0.4em
    $color

    Color of the arrow.

    		Colorwhite
    $offset

    Distance between the arrow and the text of the button. Defaults to whatever the right padding of a button is.

    		Number$button-padding

    Requires

    • [mixin] css-triangle

    button

    @mixin button($expand: false, $background: $button-background, $background-hover: $button-background-hover, $color: $button-color, $style: solid) { ... }

    Description

    Adds all styles for a button. For more granular control over styles, use the individual button mixins.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $expand

    Set to true to make the button full-width.

    		Booleanfalse
    $background

    Background color of the button.

    		Color$button-background
    $background-hover

    Background color of the button on hover. Set to auto to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

    		Color$button-background-hover
    $color

    Text color of the button. Set to auto to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

    		Color$button-color
    $style

    Set to hollow to create a hollow button. The color defined in $background will be used as the primary color of the button.

    		Keywordsolid

    Requires

    • [mixin] button-style
    • [mixin] button-hollow
    • [mixin] button-expand

    disable-mouse-outline

    @mixin disable-mouse-outline() { ... }

    Description

    Removes the focus ring around an element when a mouse input is detected.

    Parameters

    None.

    css-triangle

    @mixin css-triangle($triangle-size, $triangle-color, $triangle-direction) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a CSS triangle, which can be used for dropdown arrows, dropdown pips, and more. Use this mixin inside a &::before or &::after selector, to attach the triangle to an existing element.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $triangle-size

    Width of the triangle.

    		Number— none
    $triangle-color

    Color of the triangle.

    		Color— none
    $triangle-direction

    Direction the triangle points. Can be up, right, down, or left.

    		Keyword— none

    Used by

    • [mixin] button-dropdown

    functions

    smart-scale

    @function smart-scale() { ... }

    Description

    Scales a color to be lighter if it's light, or darker if it's dark. Use this function to tint a color appropriate to its lightness.

    Parameters

    None.
